function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between population density and outbreak of infectious diseases","Impact":"Higher risk of infectious disease spread in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures and sanitation protocols in densely populated areas","Technologies":"Advanced sanitation technologies, population tracking and monitoring systems","People":"Residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Government health departments and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Urban accessibility and vulnerability to infectious disease spread","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to infectious disease spread in areas with extended urbanization","Mitigation":"Improve healthcare infrastructure and access to medical facilities in urban and suburban areas","Technologies":"Telemedicine, healthcare information systems, urban planning technologies","People":"Residents in urban and suburban areas","Owner":"Local healthcare authorities, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Role of national population characteristics in COVID-19 diffusion","Impact":"COVID-19 more likely to spread in developed countries with higher levels of international migration","Mitigation":"Enhance surveillance and monitoring at international borders, implement strict quarantine measures for travelers","Technologies":"Border control systems, surveillance and monitoring technologies, data analysis and tracking systems","People":"Residents of countries with high international migration, travelers","Owner":"Border control agencies, public health authorities"}]}
